description: Single storey side to rear extension (Demolition of rear patio)
decision_conditions: <p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; text-indent: -18pt;">The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted (bricks, window and door frames) shall match those used in the existing building, unless stated otherwise in the approved plans and application form.</span></p>
